price: i cili kërkon t’ju nxjerrë nga toka juaj! Atëherë, çfarë na këshilloni?
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum famādhā tamurūna
